title: 大家砍树用什么
txt_content: 什么类型的斧头呢?(我会说我一般用铲子撸树吗....)

replies.author: 松__杍
replies.txt_content: 我是不会告诉你我会用苦力怕来炸树的，哈哈哈哈！sssSSS~！

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
生存前期：石斧
后期：钻石斧
钻石耐用233

replies.author: Sad_elevenKH
replies.txt_content: 铁斧，我是正常人Y(^_^)Y

replies.author: 卡拉达之翼
replies.txt_content: 当然是铁斧啦，钻石倒是没有多少....{:10_514:}
用我强大无比的双手

replies.author: 忘了回忆
replies.txt_content: LZ在骗人········或者LZ是×B

replies.author: 忘了回忆
replies.txt_content: LZ在骗人····我从来都是在商店买

replies.author: 星系爱好者
replies.txt_content: 钻石斧。

replies.author: MC.cdasc
replies.txt_content: 电锯。快。或者力量斧+lumberjack附魔。

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 一直用石斧

replies.author: 我chao爱MC
replies.txt_content: 石斧only

replies.author: 发光的木板
replies.txt_content:
松__杍 发表于 2015-7-28 14:22
我是不会告诉你我会用苦力怕来炸树的，哈哈哈哈！sssSSS~！
树能被苦力怕炸开?

replies.author: 达达丁
replies.txt_content: 我也赢铁斧，不过第一次玩的时候用手撸。。。

replies.author: 鳥妖
replies.txt_content:
木
↓
石头
↓
铁
↓
附魔钻石

replies.author: Deing
replies.txt_content: 当然是石斧，，和铁斧差别又不大

replies.author: 加强版强盗
replies.txt_content: 铁斧，后期基本钻斧

replies.author: 猫人
replies.txt_content: 像素斧，简单粗暴！

replies.author: mc天空
replies.txt_content: 我一般用我最喜欢的石斧砍树[stone_axe]

replies.author: zombiekiller
replies.txt_content: 聪明的我当然是用屎蒂夫万能的双手（爪）

replies.author: 专sha苦力怕
replies.txt_content: 石斧。我穷，即使有钻也舍不得用

replies.author: ZT7.7
replies.txt_content: 我可以说我是用手鲁的吗？？？

replies.author: efsg_
replies.txt_content: Fast Tree Farm这个器械比你们手动来砍树快多了

replies.author: lijimin
replies.txt_content: 用凋零砍，凋零树场

replies.author: dadage
replies.txt_content: 当然用电锯(工业）

replies.author: linzi1034
replies.txt_content: 石斧耐久不高，速度一般

replies.author: 绫玥
replies.txt_content: 必须是史蒂夫的一对钢拳

replies.author: x_chengz
replies.txt_content: 拿猪砸树
